argumentatrix module¶

class argumentatrix.Arguments(corpus)[source]¶

Bases: pairix.Pairix

__init__(corpus)[source]¶

This module looks for pairwise expressions in the horizon of a predicate.

annotate(*, original_pair=None, graph_coro=None)[source]¶

Annotates the pair, that means expressions that are similar to each other and are distinct from the pair, that was found as excluding each other.

draw_correlations(G, source, target)[source]¶
class argumentatrix.TestArgumentatrix(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

__init__(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Create an instance of the class that will use the named test method when executed. Raises a ValueError if the instance does not have a method with the specified name.
